title: How to Play Roblox on Paper

steps.headline: Get a few sheets of paper.
Get some pencils, markers (optional), a friend, and some scissors.
Start off by drawing your character, what does he/she look like?
steps.description: You can draw him/her exactly how he/she looks in the real game or just make him/her up.

steps.headline: Don't draw him/her big, draw him/her in a medium sized box that's about 7 or 8 inches (17.8 or 20.3 cm) long and cut the box out.
Make him/her walk, this will be important later.
steps.description: Draw him/her with one leg backwards and one forwards so it looks like he/she is walking.

steps.headline: Make other sprites like him/her jumping or holding something.
steps.description: Draw them in boxes. And cut them out.

steps.headline: Draw some gear and weapons for him/her in a small rectangle box.
Put the rectangle with the item next to his/her hand in the "holding something" sprite and see if it looks good.
Presto!
steps.description: You  have finished your character! (Don't forget to make a dying sprite where his/her body pieces are separated on the ground!)

steps.headline: Use another sheet of paper to start making a place!
steps.description: create anything you want! make sure to do it in 2D so its more simple.

steps.headline: Draw your friend's character.
steps.description: (or more characters if you have more friends)

steps.headline: Cut out two small sideways rectangles, Write TIX on one and color the rectangle yellow.
steps.description: Write ROBUX on the other rectangle and color that rectangle green. You have just made Roblox money! (TIX stands for tickets)

steps.headline: Make weapons!
steps.description: Swords, shields, katanas, lightsabers etc. Draw them in a rectangle facing upright and cut it out.

steps.headline: Make a health bar.
steps.description: Make a long, skinny rectangle that faces up and cut that out.

steps.headline: Color part of the bar black when you get hurt.
steps.description: Make health bars for your friends too! Erase the black when your character "respawns" just make your character respawn somewhere after your health bar goes completely black.

steps.headline: Have fun!
steps.description: Make sure you follow the rules on Roblox!

text: Get a few sheets of paper.  Get some pencils, markers (optional), a friend, and some scissors.  Start off by drawing your character, what does he/she look like? You can draw him/her exactly how he/she looks in the real game or just make him/her up. Don't draw him/her big, draw him/her in a medium sized box that's about 7 or 8 inches (17.8 or 20.3 cm) long and cut the box out.  Make him/her walk, this will be important later. Draw him/her with one leg backwards and one forwards so it looks like he/she is walking. Draw that in a box.  Make other sprites like him/her jumping or holding something. Draw them in boxes. And cut them out. Draw some gear and weapons for him/her in a small rectangle box. (Example: Coke in a rectangle box) Put the rectangle with the item next to his/her hand in the "holding something" sprite and see if it looks good.  Presto! You  have finished your character! (Don't forget to make a dying sprite where his/her body pieces are separated on the ground!) Use another sheet of paper to start making a place! create anything you want! make sure to do it in 2D so its more simple. Draw your friend's character. (or more characters if you have more friends) Cut out two small sideways rectangles, Write TIX on one and color the rectangle yellow. Write ROBUX on the other rectangle and color that rectangle green. You have just made Roblox money! (TIX stands for tickets) Make weapons! Swords, shields, katanas, lightsabers etc. Draw them in a rectangle facing upright and cut it out. Make a health bar. Make a long, skinny rectangle that faces up and cut that out. Color part of the bar black when you get hurt. Make health bars for your friends too! Erase the black when your character "respawns" just make your character respawn somewhere after your health bar goes completely black. Have fun! Make sure you follow the rules on Roblox!
